entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
